mean_en: an aircraft without wings that has large blades on top that go round. It can fly straight up from the ground and can also stay in one position in the air
sentence: The helicopter is flying over the sea.
sentence_trans: 这架直升机正在海面上方飞行。
word_etyma: helic螺旋 + opt适应，能力 + er表名词 → 能够螺旋上升的事物 → helicopter直升飞机
